title: Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids               For Kids      Junior Ranger Program  Â        NPS Photo The design on the Jr. Ranger badge is from classic Mimbres black and white pottery.  Become a WebRanger at home and then become a Gila Cliff Dwellings Junior Ranger when you come here! Junior Ranger Program at Gila Cliff Dwellings Pick up a Junior Ranger book (ages 7-12) or a Jr. Junior Ranger handout (6 or younger) or a Senior Ranger book (ages 12 and up) at the Visitor Center or Contact Station. Bring the finished book back to the Visitor Center when you're done to get your badge and certificate.
